game.name: Berry_Smoothie_Ice_Blocks
game.description:
Hey girls! It is a time to enjoy the summertime with a delicious berry smoothie ice blocks recipe. Beat the hot weather outside by creating this scrumptious ice cream in this free online cooking game. No need to worry how to complete the recipe since you will be provided with the proper instructions and indications. This ice cream is also my all-time favorite. My mother used to prepare this sweet fruity delight for me when I was a little girl. Hope you would also enjoy it a lot!

Join me in my full-fledged kitchen and get a chance to learn the best ice-blocks you have ever made in your life. The first thing you will have to do in this brand new cooking game is to collect all the necessary ingredients before doing anything else. This dessert could be a perfect treat for this hot season. Itâ€™s simple and easy-to-make and requires a few easily available ingredients. Start this cool html5 game with washing some strawberries, blueberries and raspberries properly. 

In the next step, you will have to peel several oranges and slice them into pieces. Also, cut the strawberries into several pieces. Make a nice berry juice by blending all the available fruits together. Pour the juice into several ice-blocks molds and place the beautiful lids on top of them and place them into freezer for a while until they get cold. You will get then some cool berry smoothie ice blocks. Mouth-watering dessert is ready to be served now. Share it with your friends in a bowl with some ice to avoid them from melting.
